verses.roman:
rūpe tāhāṅ vāsā diyā gosāñi calilā
gosāñira saṅgī bhakta rūpere mililā

synonyms: rūpe—to Rūpa; tāhāṅ—there; vāsā diyā—offered a residence; gosāñi calilā—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu left the place; gosāñira saṅgī—the associates of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhakta—all the devotees; rūpere mililā—met Rūpa Gosvāmī.
translation: After allotting residential quarters there to Rūpa Gosvāmī, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu left. Then all of the Lord's personal associates met Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī.
